subject: Order question
description_text:
I just ordered the Pro X before I saw that you have a pro X ultra. Can you
tell me what the difference is so I know if I should cancel that order and
order the pro X ultra?

Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi D Polkamp,    Pro X Ultra and Plus X are our two latest pedals. The Pro X Ultra pedal is Simsonn's flagship product, featuring an adjustable hydraulic damper and more advanced electronic components within the control unit. It delivers precise control, making it ideal for experienced players seeking fine-tuned adjustments. Equipped with an RGB system that provides feedback based on in-game telemetry data, it boasts a more aesthetically pleasing lighting design and form factor to enhance the overall atmosphere. However, should these features be unnecessary, the Plus X pedal offers superior value for money – employing the same high-quality elastomer, a 200kg sensor, and equally robust construction.

Does the pro-x ultra come with haptics? I don’t see motors in the box.



On Mon, Nov 10, 2025 at 4:53 AM support@simsonn.com

So I paid the $71 difference but it did not come with the haptics.
Comparing the prices online it’s $392 shipped for what I wanted and you
charged me a total of $339. Can I send you the additional $53 for the motor
and bracket? If not I want to initiate a return.

Best,

Derek Polkamp
Hi D Polkamp,    Please do not worry, this is another tracking link for your shipment.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047042103004
